item.title: Ladder fix
item.dc:creator: @Kingclawz Kingclawz
item.description:
@Kingclawz wrote:

Hey I am creating a server with some friends and we made this ladder that you can click on to go to train your summoning. But when you click on it you automatically tele to the place. I want to make it so you actually have to walk up and go down the ladder but I’m not sure how. This is my code

case 1754://Stairs down edge
              c.objectYOffset = 1;
        c.objectDistance = 0;
     c.teleportToX = 2208;
              c.teleportToY = 5346;
     c.sendMessage("Train your summoning here!");
     break;

please tell me the fix to it.

Read full topic
